sections.title: Building Features End-to-End
sections.content: Claude Code can handle complete feature development from models to tests. It understands your project structure and follows your conventions.
sections.example:
claude "Create a blog post feature with:
- Post and Comment models
- REST API endpoints
- Admin interface
- Basic tests"

sections.title: Code Review with /review
sections.content:
The /review command provides intelligent code analysis focusing on:

  • Security vulnerabilities
  • Performance issues
  • Django best practices
  • Code style consistency

sections.title: Extended Thinking Mode
sections.content: For complex architectural decisions or performance optimization, use extended thinking mode. Claude will take more time to deeply analyze the problem.
sections.example:
# Activate extended thinking
claude --think "Design a caching strategy for our high-traffic Django API"
